device_name.name: name
device_name.label: Nome do dispositivo
device_name.description: Define a friendly name for the gateway device. The name cannot be changed if the device has users.

device_ip.name: ip
device_ip.label: Nome do host ou endereço IP
device_ip.description: Set the Ip address for the device

device_pool.name: pool
device_pool.label: Sub-redes do pool de endereços IP
device_pool.description: Define comma separated address pools - required for dhcp. To use device pools for ppp enable the option in api settings.

device_user.name: user
device_user.label: Nome de usuário
device_user.description: Provide username to login to the gateway device

device_password.name: password
device_password.label: Senha
device_password.description: Provide password to login to the gateway device

config_auto_ppp_user.name: auto_ppp_user
config_auto_ppp_user.label: Gerar automaticamente nome de usuário
config_auto_ppp_user.description: Enable to generate username and password automatically

config_uisp_url.name: uisp_url
config_uisp_url.label: Url para api do unms
config_uisp_url.description: If this software is not running on the uisp server then change localhost to the name or ip address and port of the uisp server

config_uisp_token.name: uisp_token
config_uisp_token.label: Token de api do Unms
config_uisp_token.description: Generate the token in unms settings under users. The token allows this software to retrieve data from uisp.

config_ppp_pool.name: ppp_pool
config_ppp_pool.label: Pool de endereços pppoe globais
config_ppp_pool.description: Specify comma separated subnets to use for pppoe accounts. Global pools are used on any router and require a dynamic routing protocol such as ospf or rip to propagate the framed addresses.

config_router_ppp_pool.name: router_ppp_pool
config_router_ppp_pool.label: Usar pool de dhcp para pppoe
config_router_ppp_pool.description: Enable this to use the dhcp pool that you have defined under managed devices. This will disable the global pppoe pool below

config_excl_addr.name: excl_addr
config_excl_addr.label: Exclusões de pool IP
config_excl_addr.description: List ranges of addresses that should not be assigned to dhcp and ppp clients from the pools

config_active_list.name: active_list
config_active_list.label: Lista de endereços Mikrotik para usuários ativos
config_active_list.description: Optional name of dynamic firewall list for accounts that are not suspended

config_disabled_list.name: disabled_list
config_disabled_list.label: Lista de endereços Mikrotik para usuários deficientes
config_disabled_list.description: Name of dynamic firewall list for filtering and redirecting suspended accounts

config_disabled_profile.name: disabled_profile
config_disabled_profile.label: Perfil Mikrotik para usuários deficientes
config_disabled_profile.description: Mikrotik ppp profile that is applied to suspended accounts. The profile has to be created and configured each router

config_disabled_rate.name: disabled_rate
config_disabled_rate.label: Limite de taxa Mikrotik para contas com deficiência
config_disabled_rate.description: Mikrotik rate applied to disabled profile and disabled dhcp queues

config_unsuspend_date_fix.name: unsuspend_date_fix
config_unsuspend_date_fix.label: Habilitar correção de data da fatura não suspensa
config_unsuspend_date_fix.description: Enable to adjust the anniversary billing date when unsuspending accounts

config_unsuspend_fix_wait.name: unsuspend_fix_wait
config_unsuspend_fix_wait.label: Atraso na correção da data da fatura em segundos

config_pppoe_user_attr.name: pppoe_user_attr
config_pppoe_user_attr.label: Atributo personalizado para nome de usuário

config_pppoe_caller_attr.name: pppoe_caller_attr
config_pppoe_caller_attr.label: Atributo personalizado para ID de chamador
config_pppoe_caller_attr.description: Defines the client's pppoe caller id

config_device_name_attr.name: device_name_attr
config_device_name_attr.label: Atributo personalizado para nome de dispositivo
config_device_name_attr.description: Defines the name of the router on which the service account will be created

config_mac_addr_attr.name: mac_addr_attr
config_mac_addr_attr.label: Atributo personalizado para endereço mac dhcp
config_mac_addr_attr.description: Defines the client's mac address for a dhcp lease. Note that providing a mac address disables pppoe for the client

config_ip_addr_attr.name: ip_addr_attr
config_ip_addr_attr.label: Atributo personalizado para endereço ip manual
config_ip_addr_attr.description: Defines a manually assigned ip address. Ip address can be from an external pool that is not defined in this api

config_disable_contention.name: disable_contention
config_disable_contention.label: Desabilitar contenção de largura de banda
config_disable_contention.description: Check option to disable parent queues. May take a few minutes to apply and will delete parent queues from routers.
